about.origin: I'm a Vietnamese born in Czech Republic. Right now living in Prague. I graduated in Software engineering (specialization: Web development) from FIT CTU in Prague.
about.motivation: I'm open for new opportunities. Feel free to contact me via socials. I'm willing to learn new things, technologies. I'm interested in Web development using React.js/Vue.js. I have little experience with Javascript, Sass, as right now I'm learning to code in React, this personal website is also a part of my learning path. I also have basic knowledge in other programming languages like C++ and Java and knowledge in algorithms.
about.currentJob: Currently I'm working for Technology Agency of Czech Republic (TA ÄŒR). Where I've been working since my study days as a part-timer. Working mainly with html and css, being an easy job was perfect to combine with my studies but in the near future I'll be looking for new challenges.
